name: build maze
description:
make your own mazewith build maze

how to play:

move: wasd

some blocks can be broken

go to the Entrance to play

make mode:

left mouse: place block

right mouse: remove block

play butten to test map

save butten: left mouse to save, right mous to load map

wen you come back and the map is gone. you have to load it again

shift: fullscreen
